message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. It's an innovative solution that has been designed to revolutionize the industry. Given its high value to us, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1200000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I see the value of your product, $1200000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $900000, which would be a good starting point for both of us. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, I believe we can find a middle ground. I am willing to consider your offer but need to adjust the price slightly. My counteroffer is $950000 for the product. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable to you.
